Help Line
What You need to do

How To Protect YourSelf

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellendus odit nisi commodi ad quia quas

You Should do
  • Stay at home
  • Wear mask
  • Use Sanitizer
  • Disinfect your home
  • Wash your hands
  • Frequent self-isolation
You Should avoid
  • Avoid infected people
  • Avoid animals
  • Avoid handshaking
  • Aviod infected surfaces
  • Don't touch your face
  • Avoid droplets
